title: Yoraiz0r's set
info: Yoraiz0r's set is a vanity developer item set that can be obtained rarely (5% chance) from Treasure Bags in Expert Mode. It is the vanity set made for Yoraiz0r, one of the programmers who develops Terraria. The Scowl will add a shadow effect over the character's eyes.
stat:
Type
VanitySet
Tooltip'Great for impersonating devs!'
Rarity09*
Sell15 (set)
